responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "E505CC404844E725F76327BCC994253D", "The remains of Muckbeard sucked the life out of the surrounding landscape. On his deathbed, a black hole appeared to tug at the fabric of the world. Without its host the curse roamed free through the plains, causing havoc in the absence of essence, and spewing corruption throughout the lowlands. It took many nightfalls for the restoration to occur, but sure enough Muckbeards Curse outlasted his legacy as a fair and righteous lord vassal.")
name: MADD_0010_MBD_Soulstone3_12
